frontmatter.title: Design System for Enterprise
frontmatter.description: Design Systems is to provide products with a consistent look, streamline the design and development process, and boost team's productivity. And more than that, for an organization it gives a developer mobility between teams and products when all the Products in a company runs based on one single design system

frontmatter.title: Web Components - a Big Step Forward
frontmatter.description: The key challenges for an organizations is building UI components with high re-usability, which also ensures brand consistency and avoid redundancy between teams. There will be number of teams in an organization which runs with different frameworks and technologies and which is naturally unavoidable. But if you can manage to avoid rebuilding similar components at a certain level, then that is a big achievement
